txt.en: Discover the entrance to the Court of Seregost
You have discovered the entrance to the Court of Seregost!
You have discovered the entrance to the Court of Seregost.
To earn this deed, you must discover the entrance to the Court of Seregost.
You have discovered the entrance to the Court of Seregost, the Blood-fort of Lhaereth, which looms over the vile murk of Agarnaith.
